about_the_game:
Fiora is a roguelike game in which you will see randomly generated maps, you need to fight shadows, and along the way collect firewood to maintain the flame of Fiora, without which you will not be able to use magic.
Feel the dynamic gameplay unusual for this genre, use dodge, think through the route, push obstacles if they interfere with your path :)



Collect crystal oil to improve the characteristics of your weapons. At the moment, the game has three types of weapons, four classes, and the ability to improve it to +20, the main thing is not to forget that when improving, the weapon can break and disappear from your inventory



Fight bosses and special opponents that appear from time to time, or during certain events
detailed_description:
Fiora is a roguelike game in which you will see randomly generated maps, you need to fight shadows, and along the way collect firewood to maintain the flame of Fiora, without which you will not be able to use magic.
Feel the dynamic gameplay unusual for this genre, use dodge, think through the route, push obstacles if they interfere with your path :)



Collect crystal oil to improve the characteristics of your weapons. At the moment, the game has three types of weapons, four classes, and the ability to improve it to +20, the main thing is not to forget that when improving, the weapon can break and disappear from your inventory



Fight bosses and special opponents that appear from time to time, or during certain events
name: Fiora

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10\11
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050TI
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4096 MB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • VR Support: -

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10\11
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4096 MB available space
  • Sound Card: -
